code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: loss of contrast sensitivity on testing
(+) loss of rod and/or cone sensitivity on testing noted by lack of light adaptation

observation.value: loss of contrast sensitivity on testing
(+) loss of rod and/or cone sensitivity on testing noted by lack of light adaptation

td.content: s:a white M consultant aged 29 years presents with moderate impaired vision in dim light or dark, moderate progressive blurred vision in both eyes, Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. he has history of moderate reduced peripheral vision. Denies ever using tobacco he consumes 2 drinks per night o:Height 73 in, Weight 156 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 93, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments, and ordered contrast sensitivity testing.

content2.Unmatched: dim light or dark , moderate progressive blurred vision
Denies ever using tobacco he consumes

td.content: s:pt reports moderate progressive blurred vision in both eyes, moderate impaired vision in dim light or dark. Also complains of moderate reduced peripheral vision from time to time. he is a white M consultant aged 29 years. describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 3 years in his past Patient does not smoke o:Height 73 in, Weight 157 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

content2.Unmatched: pt reports moderate progressive blurred vision
his past Patient does not smoke

td.content: s:pt presents with progressive moderate progressive blurred vision in both eyes, moderate impaired vision in dim light or dark and moderate reduced peripheral vision for past 2 days. he is a 29 YO male consultant. he denies smoking Patient is a moderate drinker o:Height 73 in, Weight 158 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 18 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Vision Test.

content2.Unmatched: moderate reduced peripheral vision for past

td.content: Do not IV Fluid and Support
